title: Hacked my account
body:
umm a week ago when I tried to log into my account it said my account had been temporarily suspended and all I thought of it is "this makes no sense I haven't don't anything wrong must just be doing something about the game itself" so I left it like that but now (a week later) I tried to go on and it said I was now permanently suspended and to check my email address for more info on this suspension but I checked and didn't have any email.

I think someone might of hacked into my account (I haven't told any1 mu username or password). plz help me account name is Jaknelben its on OCE server. I have spent money of rp bought skins and champions on it and I'm a little disappointed to now think that money was waisted now can you please tell me why and help me get this fixed

replies.body:
ive also been hacked but this account called rocso hacked me and sold my account to someone else. when i logged on today i got a large text saying i did some bad texts but i didnt do it
so plz help me
